00004 /*
00005  Use like this:
00006  id dict = [NSDictionary dictionary];
00007  NSNumber *ten = NMMakeNumber(10.0f);
00008  [dict setObject:ten forKey:@"numberOfFingers"];
00009  [dict setObject:NMMakeNumber(23) forKey:@"fnord"];
00010  [dict setObject:NMMakeNumber(YES) forKey:@"wantFries"];
00011  */
00012 
00013 #define N(aValue) ({ \
00014 /* The stack var is here, so this macro can accept constants directly. */ \
00015 __typeof__(aValue) __aValue = (aValue); \
00016 [NSNumber numberWithValue:&__aValue objCType:@encode(__typeof__(aValue))]; \
00017 }) \
00018 
00019 @interface NSNumber (CreatingFromArbitraryTypes)
00020 + numberWithValue:(const void *)aValue objCType:(const char *)aTypeDescription;
00021 - initWithValue:(const void *)aValue objCType:(const char *)aTypeDescription;
00022 @end
